item.title: Roblox: Flag Wars Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • Flag Wars Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Roblox: Flag Wars
  • Flag Wars Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Flag Wars
  • About the Flag Wars Developers

Capturing flags has always been a popular mechanic in games and the developers of Flag Wars have brought the tried and tested formula to Roblox in spectacular fashion. To spice things up a little, they also added quite a few weapons to the game that can be bought with in-game currency. For Roblox players who want to shoot their favorite weapon as quickly as possible, redeeming the latest Flag Wars codes can be a massive help.

Updated October 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Flag Wars has a range of codes you can redeem for different types of rewards, including Cash, Candy, Popsicles, and more. These rewards can help you progress faster by giving you resources to use in battles and events. Whether you’re looking for a quick cash boost or seasonal items, there are plenty of options available. Be sure to keep an eye out for future updates, as more codes may arrive soon.

Flag Wars Codes

Here is a list of all active and inactive codes for Flag Wars . Developers often add new codes, but hurry up and redeem active codes now because they may expire soon.

All Working Flag Wars Codes

  • SUMMER25 - Use this code for $2000 Cash. (NEW)
  • HUNT - Use this code for $1500 Cash and 250 Eggs.
  • JOLLY - Use this code for 1 Skip Voucher.
  • SEASON 2 - Use this code for 5000 Candy.
  • SEASON 1 - Use this code for $5000 Cash.
  • INDEPENDENCE - Use this code for 1000 Popsicles.
  • TyFor355k - Use this code for $1400 Cash.
  • CANDY - Use this code for 25,000 Candy.
  • TyFor315k - Use this code for $8500 Cash.
  • THX4LIKES - Use this code for $1200 Cash.
  • 100MIL - Use this code for $1200 Cash.
  • SCRIPTLY - Use this code for $800 Cash.

All Expired Flag Wars Codes

  • 6TH ANNIVERSARY - Use this code for $2000 Cash.
  • FREEP90 - Use this code to get a free P90.
  • 500MIL - Use this code for 50000 Eggs and $1000.
  • SPRING - Use this code for 1000 Eggs.
  • POTIONS - Use this code for $3500 Cash.
  • TREASURE - Use this code for $8500 Cash.
  • COINS - Use this code for $1500 Cash.
  • TyFor265k - Use this code for $1500 Cash.
  • EASTER2023 - Use this code for 1500 eggs.
  • TyFor200k - Use this code for $1500 cash.
  • TyFor100k - Use this code for $1500 cash.
  • FREETEC9 - Use this code for a free TEC9.
  • TyFor60k - Use this code for $1200 cash.
  • TyFor195k - Use this code for $1200 cash.
  • GINGERBREAD - Use this code for 12,000 Gingerbread and 500 Cash.
  • 80KCANDY - Use this code for 80,000 Candy.
  • FREEMP5 - Use for an MP5.
  • Candy4U - Use this code for 8,500 Candy.
  • FREEMP5 - Use this code for a free MP5.
  • FREESMG – Use this code to get free gun.
  • FROST – Use this code to get $500 and 4,500 snowflakes.
  • Snow4U – Use this code to get $900 cash and 12,500 snowflakes.
  • THX4LIKES – Use this code to get $1,200 cash.
  • TyFor30k – Use this code to get $1250 cash and 19,500 snowflakes.
  • UPDATESOON – Use this code to get $2500 cash.
  • XMAS – Use this code to get 2,000 snowflakes.

How to Redeem Codes in Roblox: Flag Wars

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Flag Wars is a very simple task. Just follow the instructions below.

  • Open Roblox and launch Flag Wars .
  • Find the blue ticket-shaped icon on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this icon.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Enter Code Here."

Flag Wars Tips and Tricks

Below, players will learn a few tips to help improve their gameplay:

Use Different Types of Weapons

Using different types of weapons depending on the situation can significantly increase the player's chances of survival. For example, if a player is out of ammo and the enemy is close enough, one should use a sword to avoid wasting time reloading, and a sniper rifle should be used when the enemy is far away.

Build Tunnels

Building bypass tunnels can increase a player's chances of getting the flag, so fans should try digging their own bypass tunnels and use bombs to make it faster.

Edit the Sensitivity Settings

In the game settings, players can change the sensitivity to make it easier for them to aim. The best way to get it right is to experiment.

Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Flag Wars

Shooters are incredibly popular on Roblox , and players always have a fairly large selection of games to try. Below they will find a list of the best Roblox games like Flag Wars . These games are also shooters, and they are very exciting to play, so those who are looking to try something a little different should consider checking them out.

  • Base Battles
  • Underground War 2.0
  • Military Tycoon
  • Ohio Codes
  • Da Hood

About the Flag Wars Developers

Flag Wars was created by the development team Scriptly Studios. They also have some other interesting projects that were popular before, but now, unfortunately, they have very few active players:

  • Moving Day
  • Road Trip

item.title: Roblox: Arsenal Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Codes For Arsenal
  • How to Redeem Codes in Arsenal
  • How to Play Arsenal
  • The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Arsenal
  • About the Arsenal Developers

Arsenal is a game in which Roblox players can unleash their shooting potential. This article will provide all the latest Arsenal codes and instructions on how to redeem them. Fans can also find out more about the developers and get some recommendations for similar Roblox games.

Updated October 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Arsenal codes give you a variety of cosmetic rewards like skins, announcer voices, taunts, and more. These items don’t affect gameplay but let you customize your experience and stand out in matches. With so many unique options available, it’s worth checking which codes are still active and redeeming them while you can. Be sure to return later, as more codes are often added with new updates.

All Codes For Arsenal

Roblox players looking to get some bonus strength, coins, and gems can use the following Arsenal codes. These expire at random intervals, so players should redeem them as soon as they become available. Arsenal codes can only be redeemed once per account and can be released at any time during the month, so game fans should be sure to check back here often to avoid missing out.

Working Arsenal Codes

  • enforcer - Redeem for an Enforcer announcer
  • xonae - Redeem for a Xonae Announcer Voice
  • ANNA - Redeem for Anna Skin
  • PET - Redeem for PetrifyTV Announcer Voice
  • POKE - Redeem for Poke Skin
  • CBROX - Redeem for Phoenix Skin
  • TRGTBOARD - Redeem for Hoverboard taunt
  • GARCELLO - Redeem for Garcello skin, Garcello kill effect, and an Emote
  • ROLVE - Redeem for Fanboy Skin
  • EPRIKA - Redeem for Eprika announcer voice
  • Bandites - Redeem for Bandites announcer voice
  • JOHN - Redeem for John Announcer Voice
  • FLAMINGO - Redeem for rewards
  • goodnight - Redeem to Teleport to Snowy Bridge
  • E - Redeem for a Calling Card

Expired Arsenal Codes

  • fate - Redeem to Teleport to Fate
  • KITTEN - Redeem for Koneko Announcer Voice
  • Enter your Roblox ID Backwards - Redeem to be teleported to Snowy Bridge
  • Bandites - Redeem for Bandites Announcer Voice
  • F00LISH - Redeem for Jackeryz Skin (The '00' in this code is two zeroes)
  • TROLLFACE - Unknown Reward
  • POG - Redeem for 1,200 Bucks
  • BLOXY - Redeem for Free Money requiredbycontract tcartnocybderiuqer
  • THE BANANA MAN - Redeem for free rewards
  • 10keni - Unknown Reward
  • wake up - Redeem to Teleport to Snowy Bridge
  • BRUTE - Redeem for a reward
  • xonaeday21 - Unknown Reward
  • hammertime - Redeem for Ban Hammer Skin
  • trolling… - Redeem for Tomfoolery Delinquent skin
  • NEVERBROKEN - Redeem for Beatable Calling Card
  • CRACKED - Gave a Calling Card
  • dhmubruh - Redeem for Grind Set Calling Card
  • the 2021 spooky code - Redeem for Herobrine Delinquent
  • 3BILLY - Redeem for Holoend Kill Effect
  • NEWMILO - Redeem for Delinquent skin with the Milo unusual
  • NEWMILO (WOMAN) - Redeem for Rabblerouser skin with the Milo unusual
  • SCALLYWAG - Unknown Reward
  • BALLISTICBSIDE - Unknown Reward
  • GULLIBLE - Unknown Reward
  • MILO - Redeem for a Delinquent skin
  • BALLISTIC - Unknown Reward
  • unusualbias - Redeem code for Suspicious Stranger Skin
  • CharityACT5k - Unknown Reward
  • CastlersUnusual100k - Redeem code for an Ace Pilot Skin
  • TheBloxies - Redeem for Bloxy Delinquent Skin, Bloxy Award Melee, & Bloxy Kill Effect

How to Redeem Codes in Arsenal

When it comes to redeeming codes in Arsenal, players will need to follow a few simple steps. If they find that a code doesn't work, they should make sure that they entered it correctly and then try again. If the code still doesn't work, it could be because it expired recently or has already been redeemed by the player.

  1. Launch Arsenal
  2. Click on the Twitter button on the bottom left of the screen
  3. Enter the code in the empty field once the pop-up prompt appears
  4. Press enter to complete the process and redeem the reward

How to Play Arsenal

Arsenal is a first-person shooter. As in games of a similar genre, players have several modes in this game: 4 teams, two teams, and one versus every other player, where they have to compete to find out who is the best at shooting. This game has one more key feature, though, that being that the matches that players play are also divided by the type of weapon, and every time a player gets a kill, they get another weapon.

The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Arsenal

Playing the same game for a long time can get boring. That's why players are actively looking for alternatives, and there are plenty to this game. Below, gamers will find five of the best Roblox fighting games like Arsenal :

  • Jailbreak
  • Flag Wars
  • Da Hood
  • Underground War 2.0
  • The Resistance Tycoon

About the Arsenal Developers

Arsenal has created a ROLVe development team. They specialize in shooters and fighting games, and their titles are quite interesting and cool. Here is a list of their games:

  • Counter Blox
  • Typical Colors 2
  • Right 2 Fight V0.4.0
  • Silly Simulator
  • Unit 1968
  • Arsenal

item.title: Nintendo Fixes Compatibility Issues for 5 Switch Games on Switch 2
item.description:
The Switch 2 has received another round of fixes improving its backward compatibility, with the changes affecting five Switch 1 titles. Nintendo has also flagged issues with several other last-gen games on the Switch 2, signaling intention to address them in the near future.

Since officially announcing its latest console in January 2025, Nintendo has been clear that Switch 2 backward compatibility won't be absolute despite being extensive. The company cautioned that some Switch titles may not work fully due to specific hardware requirements, as is the case with Ring Fit Adventure , which comes with an accessory that's only compatible with the original Joy-Con. It also warned that certain older games could experience unforeseen issues on the new system that may take time to resolve.

Switch 2 Now Fully Backward Compatible With Warframe and 4 More Games

Nintendo's efforts to improve the console's backward compatibility have now continued with five additional fixes being rolled out. They target Warframe , Deemo Reborn , Ultra Age , Library of Ruina , and Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 . All of these titles should now be fully compatible with the Switch successor. Their fixes have been distributed with the Switch 2 20.5.0 update, launched at the tail end of September 2025.

The 20.5.0 update is a compact release that should only take a few seconds to download on a gigabit connection. Its official patch notes do not go into any details regarding the new Switch 2 backward-compatibility fixes—a pattern that Nintendo has already established with its last several console updates.

Simultaneously with this release, Nintendo updated the eShop pages of several Switch 1 titles with notices informing users of some newly identified compatibility issues on the Switch 2. There are five of these games in total: Jelly Troops , Transistor , Mugen Souls , Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning , and Subway Simulator 2025: City Train . Of those, only Jelly Troops has been flagged as currently unsupported by the Switch 2, on account of some unspecified progression problems.

New Nintendo Switch 2 Backward Compatibility Fixes for Switch 1 Games

  • Deemo Reborn
  • Library of Ruina
  • Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025
  • Ultra Age
  • Warframe

The other four are labeled as playable on the Switch 2, with some caveats. For instance, Transistor players are advised not to remove the console from the dock because doing so in certain parts of the game may stop it from "functioning correctly." Subway Simulator 2025: City Train was flagged for animation issues, while Mugen Souls reportedly has problems correctly displaying certain items after they are obtained. Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning previously had progression issues which have now been fixed, but some visual glitches remain in certain areas. Nintendo is investigating all of the newly acknowledged problems and is expected to attempt addressing them in the near future.

Source: Nintendo Everything

item.title: Pokemon TCG Pocket Shares Important Information About Pack Points
item.description:
Pokemon TCG Pocket has revealed some important news about the game's Pack Points, confirming that players won't need to worry about losing their older Pack Points. The massively popular mobile version of the beloved trading card game has been nothing less than a monumental success since its original debut nearly a year ago. Pokemon TCG Pocket saw instant traction from fans with millions of players hopping onto the game, releasing plenty of big exciting expansions. Now, The Pokemon Company is sharing some helpful details about the game's Pack Point system.

Pack Points serve as a "pity" system for players to be able to pick up cards they couldn't pull from the game's different expansions. Pokemon TCG Pocket grants 5 Pack Points every time a player opens up a pack in Pokemon TCG Pocket , with the player able to redeem Pack Points for any card from the set provided they have enough. Pack Points are exclusive to the pack they come from, with each expansion having its own separate Pack Point count to use for cards from that specific set. A new update is now sharing a helpful failsafe for players collecting Pack Points.

Pokemon TCG Pocket shared a new notice through the game's official social media accounts, giving a new reminder about the game's Pack Points. The post confirmed that Pack Points earned from specific sets in Pokemon TCG Pocket will not expire after a pack leaves the in-game shop, with players able to still redeem their Pack Points for cards. The Pokemon Company also confirms that TCG Pocket 's in-game tooltip regarding Pack Points is incorrect, with an update coming later to address the issue.

Pokemon TCG Pocket Shares Information About Pack Points

The news about Pokemon TCG Pocket 's Pack Points comes as the mobile game debuted its newest expansion early last week. Deluxe Pack ex debuted as a set filled largely with reprints of older cards from previous sets, with many receiving new artworks or full art versions. Deluxe Pack ex's heavy focus on reprints was joined by an important disclaimer regarding the reprint-heavy set, with cards pulled from Deluxe Pack ex not counting towards completion of the cards' original sets. Deluxe Pack ex also featured smaller packs, with only four cards instead of the typical five.

Deluxe Pack ex's litany of reprints serves to kick off the festivities for Pokemon TCG Pocket 's upcoming 1st anniversary. TCG Pocket will officially celebrate one year since its release near the end of the month on October 30, with plenty of celebrations in-store for the mobile game. Pokemon TCG Pocket is set to offer multiple special limited-time events this month, including a "Parallel Foil" Mass Outbreak event and the "B1" expansion at the end of the month adding Mega Pokemon. Pokemon TCG Pocket fans should have lots to celebrate as the game moves into its second year.

67
8.6 /10

Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket

item.title: Escape From Tarkov Reveals When Softcore Changes Are Coming
item.description:
Escape From Tarkov developer Battlestate Games has revealed that "softcore changes" are set to arrive in the game very soon. The exact nature of the upcoming Escape From Tarkov update remains a mystery, with a full list of changes on the way.

Earlier this year, Escape From Tarkov announced it's finally leaving early access, setting its release date for November 15, 2025. Since then, the game has been gearing up for that massive milestone, with a Steam release also on the way. Given that Escape From Tarkov has always been restricted to its proprietary launcher throughout its early access stint, it could mark the start of a big period of growth for the game.

Escape From Tarkov 'Softcore Changes' Coming on October 8

In a post on X, Battlestate Games studio head Nikita Buyanov revealed that a set of "softcore changes" are on the way for the popular extraction shooter, with an approximate date of October 8. He then revealed in a follow-up post that the list of changes will be "pretty big," although few specifics have been provided at this point.

It was only a few months ago that Escape From Tarkov released its brutal hardcore wipe, which made the game far more difficult, even for experienced players. It stands to reason, then, that this softcore update will swing the game in the other direction, as something of a balance test before Escape From Tarkov releases into 1.0. While not every change from this softcore update may remain in the main game, it's an interesting experiment to see what works and what doesn't.

As November 15 approaches, Battlestate Games has been giving players a better idea of what they can expect from the initial full release of Escape From Tarkov . Just recently, the developer confirmed that there are plans for four story endings to Escape From Tarkov , although only a few players will be able to get the best one. The studio also plans to continue updating the game way beyond its November 15, 2025, launch.

8.3 /10

Escape from Tarkov
